tool_description: Stratifies patients into risk categories and care pathways based on comprehensive risk assessment scores.

overall_risk_score.description: Comprehensive risk score from clinical risk calculator (0-100)

care_setting.description: Care setting: inpatient, outpatient, emergency, icu

error_messages: Invalid risk score: Risk score must be numeric value between 0-100
Invalid stratification model: Use standard, disease_specific, or population_based
Invalid care setting: Use inpatient, outpatient, emergency, or icu
Stratification failed: Unable to assign appropriate risk category
usage: Provide patient_id and overall_risk_score from clinical risk calculator. Optionally specify stratification_model and care_setting for context-appropriate categorization.

risk_stratum.description: Assigned risk stratum: low, moderate, high, critical

care_pathway.description: Recommended care pathway based on risk level

intervention_priority.description: Intervention priority level: routine, urgent, immediate

estimated_los.description: Estimated length of stay in days (if applicable)
